item.title: Southold Bay Oyster Farm Tour
item.description: Get a behind-the-scenes peek at a working oyster farm during this guided visit to Southold Bay. Learn about the different stages of oyster farming at all levels of growth, from conception in the hatchery to a look at the market-sized grow-out stage. Tours ends with an oyster tasting along the waterfront, paired with local North Fork wine.

item.title: Captain Steve's Sailing Experience on Long Island
item.description:
Here are some reasons why people enjoy sailing with Captain Steve.
Beautiful Scenery, that is best enjoyed from the water. With Captain Steve's Sailing Experience, you can experience the beauty of the area from a unique perspective.
Professional Guidance: Captain Steve is an experienced sailor who knows the area well. He can provide you with professional guidance on how to sail and show you the best places to visit.
Relaxation: Sailing is a relaxing activity that can help you unwind and forget about the stresses of daily life. Captain Steve's provides a peaceful and calming environment that allows you to escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.
Adventure: Sailing with Captain Steve's Sailing Experience is an adventure. You can experience the thrill of sailing on the open water and explore new places.

image.alt: Captain Steve's Sailing Experience on Long Island
